name: ClockTeacher for kids
description:
Old style clock teaching to the new generation digital kids. Check, practice, play, measure your knowledge. 

Have you ever experienced that today’s children are aware of the concept of time, learn to interpret it quickly, but are at war with the time shown by a traditional (analog) clock? You can get to know the past in a playful way. 

No secret payment, no fee, no in-app purchase, just some ads at Android version. Check the Pro version on google Play Store to avoid ads (for a price of few V-buck... )

If you are interested in PC and/or html port just let me know and I will consider it.
